import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel Signature Request"}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/signature_request/cancel/{signature_request_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Cancel a signature request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      in: "path",
      name: "signature_request_id",
      schema: { type: "string" },
      required: true,
      description: "ID of the signature request to cancel",
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      description: "Information about the canceled signature request",
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            "x-expanded": true,
            properties: {
              signature_request_id: {
                type: "string",
                description: "The unique identifier for the signature request.",
              },
              status: {
                type: "string",
                description: "The status of the signature request.",
                enum: ["CANCELLED"],
              },
            },
          },
          example: {
            signature_request_id: "1234567890",
            status: "CANCELLED",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    "4xx": {
      description: "Unexpected error",
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            "x-expanded": true,
            required: ["error_code", "error_message"],
            properties: {
              error_code: { type: "string" },
              error_message: { type: "string" },
            },
            title: "Error",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
